dc:title: Letter to an Agnostic
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Answers the assertion of a young agnostic that religion is morbid. Recalls the struggle of St. Theresa of Avila as well as her own efforts to find joy in God. Suggests that the arrogance and rebelliousness of youth can deprive the soul of life.
